title.rendered: The New Google Pixel 6a: The Ins & Outs

content.rendered:
Google are known for producing high-performing handsets which are full of speed, power and intelligent photography ability, and with their highly anticipated Google Pixel 6a 5G model going live for preorder on the 21st of July, the Pixel family is finally growing. Here is all the magic this 5G handset has to offer:

Google Pixel 6a: All Day Power

One of the worst things that can happen to any modern-day smartphone user is their phone inconveniently dying midway through the day, with not a charger in sight…. (a complete horror story we know). Well with the Google Pixel 6a’s 4410 mAh long-lasting battery this won’t ever be an issue. Users are supplied with much-needed all-day power (24 hours+) and with the Extreme Battery Saver mode turned on, can even extend their battery life for up to 72 hours total. When you do in fact have to plug in and charge your device, this experience will be quick thanks to fast wired 18W charging. This is a smartphone that wants you to get up and go!

Google Pixel 6a Design & Display

Looks aren’t everything but the design of the Google Pixel 6a 5G is pretty impressive. With 3 different colours up for grabs: Sage, Chalk and Charcoal, paired with a beautifully sleek exterior with rounded edges, no matter what colour option people go for they will be wowed. Also, the large 6.1” FHD+ OLED display featured on the device only adds to the premium aesthetic. 

Google Pixel 6a Camera

Lights, camera, action. It’s time for the juicy details about the camera included on this flagship handset. The rear of this device features a dual-lens set-up, consisting of a 12.2MP wide lens and a 12MP ultrawide lens. These lenses and added features like Face Unblur work effortlessly together to give users stable and blur-free shots. Magic Eraser gives users the ability to remove unwanted objects from images, and Real Tone captures the authenticity of all skin tones! All these cool features mentioned are Pixel Exclusives, so they’re completely one of a kind. Side note the selfie camera on this device is 8MP so it’s also great at giving you picture-perfect photos. 

Google Pixel 6a: Protection & Privacy

Using your smartphone should be a stress-free and safe experience, and the Google Pixel 6a 5G offers just that. With IP67 protection this 5G device is water and dust resistant – a saviour during all your clumsy mishaps. Top-notch security has also been covered thanks to the work of a Titan M2 chip and a Google Tensor security core, giving users an extra layer of hardware security – the perfect powerful duo. 

Now you’ve heard all the ins and outs the Google Pixel 6a 5G has to offer it’s pre-order time! Fonehouse has some of the cheapest deals for this new Google handset in the market. So what are you waiting for? Order TODAY.
